nodes.text: The Ratamesh system was a system in the Farstey sector of the Expansion Region, that contained the planet of Ratamesh.

The Ratamesh system was explored sometime between 8000 BBY and 5500 BBY during the Subterra Period to founding of Rimma and Corellian Trade Spine. It fell into the area of space known as the Trans-Hydian.
By 25 ABY, the Ratamesh system boasted a population of 100 to 500 million sentients.
